text: Ganbaixiafeng zhe jiang dui jiao'ao zi da zhe shuo:“Bu, zhe shi nimen zhouye de yinmou. Dangshi, nimen jiao women buyao xinyang an la, jiao women gei ta shezhi yu ta tongdeng de chongbai duixiang.” Dang tamen kanjian xingfa shi, tamen jiang bu yuan luchu [tamen zai chenshi weikang an la de] huihen. Wo jiang ba jiasuo dai zai bu xinyang zhe de bozi shang, tamen zhi shou tamen suo fanzui e de huan bao.
